# [Interview #1181: Little City Books-AU Tour, Entry #14](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1181#14)

#### AndrewHB

What is stick's talos?

#### Brandon Sanderson

To be the best stick it can.

#### Footnote

Before the Q&A, Brandon gave a talk on talos (sp) philosophy.
